data.name: Biotic Rifle
data.description: Ana’s rifle shoots darts that can restore health to her allies or deal ongoing damage to her enemies. She can use the rifle’s scope to zoom in on targets and make highly accurate shots.

hero.name: Ana
hero.description: Ana’s versatile arsenal allows her to affect heroes all over the battlefield. Her Biotic Rifle rounds and Biotic Grenades heal allies and damage or impair enemies; her sidearm tranquilizes key targets, and Nano Boost gives one of her comrades a considerable increase in power.

data.name: Sleep Dart
data.description: Ana fires a dart from her sidearm, rendering an enemy unconscious (though any damage will rouse them).

hero.name: Ana
hero.description: Ana’s versatile arsenal allows her to affect heroes all over the battlefield. Her Biotic Rifle rounds and Biotic Grenades heal allies and damage or impair enemies; her sidearm tranquilizes key targets, and Nano Boost gives one of her comrades a considerable increase in power.

data.name: Biotic Grenade
data.description: Ana tosses a biotic bomb that deals damage to enemies and heals allies in a small area of effect. Affected allies briefly receive increased healing from all sources, while enemies caught in the blast cannot be healed for a few moments.

hero.name: Ana
hero.description: Ana’s versatile arsenal allows her to affect heroes all over the battlefield. Her Biotic Rifle rounds and Biotic Grenades heal allies and damage or impair enemies; her sidearm tranquilizes key targets, and Nano Boost gives one of her comrades a considerable increase in power.

data.name: Nano Boost
data.description: After Ana hits one of her allies with a combat boost, they temporarily move faster, deal more damage, and take less damage from enemies’ attacks.

hero.name: Ana
hero.description: Ana’s versatile arsenal allows her to affect heroes all over the battlefield. Her Biotic Rifle rounds and Biotic Grenades heal allies and damage or impair enemies; her sidearm tranquilizes key targets, and Nano Boost gives one of her comrades a considerable increase in power.

data.name: Configuration: Recon
data.description: In Recon mode, Bastion is fully mobile, outfitted with a submachine gun that fires steady bursts of bullets at medium range.

hero.name: Bastion
hero.description: Repair protocols and the ability to transform between stationary Assault, mobile Recon and devastating Tank configurations provide Bastion with a high probability of victory.

data.name: Configuration: Sentry
data.description: In Sentry mode, Bastion is a stationary powerhouse equipped with a gatling gun capable of unleashing a hail of bullets. The gun's aim can be "walked" across multiple targets dealing devastating damage at short to medium range.

hero.name: Bastion
hero.description: Repair protocols and the ability to transform between stationary Assault, mobile Recon and devastating Tank configurations provide Bastion with a high probability of victory.

data.name: Reconfigure
data.description: Bastion transforms between its two primary combat modes to adapt to changing battlefield conditions.

hero.name: Bastion
hero.description: Repair protocols and the ability to transform between stationary Assault, mobile Recon and devastating Tank configurations provide Bastion with a high probability of victory.

data.name: Self-Repair
data.description: Bastion restores its health; it cannot move or fire weapons while the repair process is in effect.

hero.name: Bastion
hero.description: Repair protocols and the ability to transform between stationary Assault, mobile Recon and devastating Tank configurations provide Bastion with a high probability of victory.

data.name: Configuration: Tank
data.description: In Tank mode, Bastion extends wheeled treads and a powerful long-range cannon. The cannon’s explosive shells demolish targets in a wide blast radius, but Bastion can only remain in this mode for a limited time.

hero.name: Bastion
hero.description: Repair protocols and the ability to transform between stationary Assault, mobile Recon and devastating Tank configurations provide Bastion with a high probability of victory.

data.name: Fusion Cannons
data.description: D.Va's mech is equipped with twin short-range rotating cannons. They lay down continuous, high-damage fire without needing to reload, but slow D.Va’s movement while they’re active.

hero.name: D.Va
hero.description: D.Va’s mech is nimble and powerful—its twin Fusion Cannons blast away with autofire at short range, and she can use its Boosters to barrel over enemies and obstacles, or deflect attacks with her projectile-dismantling Defense Matrix.
hero.affiliation: Mobile Exo-Force of the Korean Army

data.name: Boosters
data.description: D.Va’s mech launches into the air, her momentum carrying her forward. She can turn and change directions or barrel through her enemies, knocking them back.

hero.name: D.Va
hero.description: D.Va’s mech is nimble and powerful—its twin Fusion Cannons blast away with autofire at short range, and she can use its Boosters to barrel over enemies and obstacles, or deflect attacks with her projectile-dismantling Defense Matrix.
hero.affiliation: Mobile Exo-Force of the Korean Army

data.name: Defense Matrix
data.description: D.Va can activate this forward-facing targeting array to shoot incoming projectiles out of the air.

hero.name: D.Va
hero.description: D.Va’s mech is nimble and powerful—its twin Fusion Cannons blast away with autofire at short range, and she can use its Boosters to barrel over enemies and obstacles, or deflect attacks with her projectile-dismantling Defense Matrix.
hero.affiliation: Mobile Exo-Force of the Korean Army

data.name: Eject
data.description: D.Va ejects out of her mech when it is destroyed.

hero.name: D.Va
hero.description: D.Va’s mech is nimble and powerful—its twin Fusion Cannons blast away with autofire at short range, and she can use its Boosters to barrel over enemies and obstacles, or deflect attacks with her projectile-dismantling Defense Matrix.
hero.affiliation: Mobile Exo-Force of the Korean Army

data.name: Self-Destruct
data.description: D.Va ejects from her mech and sets its reactor to explode, dealing massive damage to nearby opponents.

hero.name: D.Va
hero.description: D.Va’s mech is nimble and powerful—its twin Fusion Cannons blast away with autofire at short range, and she can use its Boosters to barrel over enemies and obstacles, or deflect attacks with her projectile-dismantling Defense Matrix.
hero.affiliation: Mobile Exo-Force of the Korean Army

data.name: Light Gun
data.description: While outside of her mech, D.Va can continue the fight with a mid-range automatic blaster.

hero.name: D.Va
hero.description: D.Va’s mech is nimble and powerful—its twin Fusion Cannons blast away with autofire at short range, and she can use its Boosters to barrel over enemies and obstacles, or deflect attacks with her projectile-dismantling Defense Matrix.
hero.affiliation: Mobile Exo-Force of the Korean Army

data.name: Call Mech
data.description: If her armored battle suit is destroyed, D.Va can call down a fresh mech and return to the fray.

hero.name: D.Va
hero.description: D.Va’s mech is nimble and powerful—its twin Fusion Cannons blast away with autofire at short range, and she can use its Boosters to barrel over enemies and obstacles, or deflect attacks with her projectile-dismantling Defense Matrix.
hero.affiliation: Mobile Exo-Force of the Korean Army

data.name: Shuriken
data.description: Genji looses three deadly throwing stars in quick succession. Alternatively, he can throw three shuriken in a wider spread.

hero.name: Genji
hero.description: Genji flings precise and deadly Shuriken at his targets, and uses his technologically-advanced katana to deflect projectiles or deliver a Swift Strike that cuts down enemies.

data.name: Swift Strike
data.description: Genji darts forward, slashing with his katana and passing through foes in his path. If Genji eliminates a target, he can instantly use this ability again.

hero.name: Genji
hero.description: Genji flings precise and deadly Shuriken at his targets, and uses his technologically-advanced katana to deflect projectiles or deliver a Swift Strike that cuts down enemies.

data.name: Deflect
data.description: With lightning-quick swipes of his sword, Genji reflects any oncoming projectiles and can send them rebounding towards his enemies.

hero.name: Genji
hero.description: Genji flings precise and deadly Shuriken at his targets, and uses his technologically-advanced katana to deflect projectiles or deliver a Swift Strike that cuts down enemies.

data.name: Cyber-Agility
data.description: Thanks to his cybernetic abilities, Genji can climb walls and perform jumps in mid-air.

hero.name: Genji
hero.description: Genji flings precise and deadly Shuriken at his targets, and uses his technologically-advanced katana to deflect projectiles or deliver a Swift Strike that cuts down enemies.

data.name: Dragonblade
data.description: Genji brandishes his katana for a brief period of time. Until he sheathes his sword, Genji can deliver killing strikes to any targets within his reach.

hero.name: Genji
hero.description: Genji flings precise and deadly Shuriken at his targets, and uses his technologically-advanced katana to deflect projectiles or deliver a Swift Strike that cuts down enemies.

data.name: Storm Bow
data.description: Hanzo nocks and fires an arrow at his target.

hero.name: Hanzo
hero.description: Hanzo’s versatile arrows can reveal his enemies or fragment to strike multiple targets. He can scale walls to fire his bow from on high, or summon a titanic spirit dragon.

data.name: Scatter Arrow
data.description: Hanzo shoots a fragmenting arrow that ricochets off walls and objects and can strike multiple targets at once.

hero.name: Hanzo
hero.description: Hanzo’s versatile arrows can reveal his enemies or fragment to strike multiple targets. He can scale walls to fire his bow from on high, or summon a titanic spirit dragon.

data.name: Sonic Arrow
data.description: Hanzo launches an arrow that contains a sonar tracking device. Any enemy within its detection radius is visibly marked, making them easier for Hanzo and his allies to hunt down.

hero.name: Hanzo
hero.description: Hanzo’s versatile arrows can reveal his enemies or fragment to strike multiple targets. He can scale walls to fire his bow from on high, or summon a titanic spirit dragon.

data.name: Wall Climb
data.description: Hanzo can climb any vertical surface.

hero.name: Hanzo
hero.description: Hanzo’s versatile arrows can reveal his enemies or fragment to strike multiple targets. He can scale walls to fire his bow from on high, or summon a titanic spirit dragon.

data.name: Dragonstrike
data.description: Hanzo summons a Spirit Dragon which travels through the air in a line. It passes through walls in its way, devouring any enemies it encounters.

hero.name: Hanzo
hero.description: Hanzo’s versatile arrows can reveal his enemies or fragment to strike multiple targets. He can scale walls to fire his bow from on high, or summon a titanic spirit dragon.

data.name: Frag Launcher
data.description: Junkrat's Frag Launcher lobs grenades a significant distance. They bounce to reach their destination, and blow up when they strike an enemy.

hero.name: Junkrat
hero.description: Junkrat’s area-denying armaments include a Frag Launcher that lobs bouncing grenades, Concussion Mines that send enemies flying, and Steel Traps that stop foes dead in their tracks.

data.name: Concussion Mine
data.description: After placing one of his homemade Concussion Mines, Junkrat can trigger it to damage enemies and send them flying... or propel himself through the air.

hero.name: Junkrat
hero.description: Junkrat’s area-denying armaments include a Frag Launcher that lobs bouncing grenades, Concussion Mines that send enemies flying, and Steel Traps that stop foes dead in their tracks.

data.name: Steel Trap
data.description: Junkrat tosses out a giant, metal-toothed trap. Should an enemy wander too close to the trap, it clamps on, injuring and immobilizing them.

hero.name: Junkrat
hero.description: Junkrat’s area-denying armaments include a Frag Launcher that lobs bouncing grenades, Concussion Mines that send enemies flying, and Steel Traps that stop foes dead in their tracks.

data.name: Total Mayhem
data.description: Junkrat's deranged sense of humor persists past his death. If killed, he drops several live grenades.

hero.name: Junkrat
hero.description: Junkrat’s area-denying armaments include a Frag Launcher that lobs bouncing grenades, Concussion Mines that send enemies flying, and Steel Traps that stop foes dead in their tracks.

data.name: RIP-Tire
data.description: Junkrat revs up a motorized tire bomb and sends it rolling across the battlefield, climbing over walls and obstacles. He can remotely detonate the RIP-Tire to deal serious damage to enemies caught within the blast, or just wait for it to explode on its own.

hero.name: Junkrat
hero.description: Junkrat’s area-denying armaments include a Frag Launcher that lobs bouncing grenades, Concussion Mines that send enemies flying, and Steel Traps that stop foes dead in their tracks.

data.name: Sonic Amplifier
data.description: Lúcio can hit his enemies with sonic projectiles or knock them back with a blast of sound.

hero.name: Lúcio
hero.description: On the battlefield, Lúcio’s cutting-edge Sonic Amplifier buffets enemies with projectiles and knocks foes back with blasts of sound. His songs can both heal his team or boost their movement speed, and he can switch between tracks on the fly.

data.name: Crossfade
data.description: Lúcio continuously energizes himself, and nearby teammates, with music. He can switch between two songs: one amplifies movement speed, while the other regenerates health.

hero.name: Lúcio
hero.description: On the battlefield, Lúcio’s cutting-edge Sonic Amplifier buffets enemies with projectiles and knocks foes back with blasts of sound. His songs can both heal his team or boost their movement speed, and he can switch between tracks on the fly.

data.name: Amp It Up
data.description: Lúcio increases the volume on his speakers, boosting the effects of his songs.

hero.name: Lúcio
hero.description: On the battlefield, Lúcio’s cutting-edge Sonic Amplifier buffets enemies with projectiles and knocks foes back with blasts of sound. His songs can both heal his team or boost their movement speed, and he can switch between tracks on the fly.

data.name: Wall Ride
data.description: Lúcio rides along a wall. This has a slight upwards angle, allowing him to ascend the wall.

hero.name: Lúcio
hero.description: On the battlefield, Lúcio’s cutting-edge Sonic Amplifier buffets enemies with projectiles and knocks foes back with blasts of sound. His songs can both heal his team or boost their movement speed, and he can switch between tracks on the fly.

data.name: Sound Barrier
data.description: Protective waves radiate out from Lúcio’s Sonic Amplifier, briefly providing him and nearby allies with personal shields.

hero.name: Lúcio
hero.description: On the battlefield, Lúcio’s cutting-edge Sonic Amplifier buffets enemies with projectiles and knocks foes back with blasts of sound. His songs can both heal his team or boost their movement speed, and he can switch between tracks on the fly.

data.name: Peacekeeper
data.description: McCree fires off a round from his trusty six-shooter. He can fan the Peacekeeper’s hammer to swiftly unload the entire cylinder.

hero.name: McCree
hero.description: Armed with his Peacekeeper revolver, McCree takes out targets with deadeye precision and dives out of danger with eagle-like speed.

data.name: Combat Roll
data.description: McCree dives in the direction he's moving, effortlessly reloading his Peacekeeper in the process.

hero.name: McCree
hero.description: Armed with his Peacekeeper revolver, McCree takes out targets with deadeye precision and dives out of danger with eagle-like speed.

data.name: Flashbang
data.description: McCree heaves a blinding grenade that explodes shortly after it leaves his hand. The blast staggers enemies in a small radius.

hero.name: McCree
hero.description: Armed with his Peacekeeper revolver, McCree takes out targets with deadeye precision and dives out of danger with eagle-like speed.

data.name: Deadeye
data.description: Focus. Mark. Draw. McCree takes a few precious moments to aim; when he's ready to fire, he shoots every enemy in his line of sight. The weaker his targets are, the faster he'll line up a killshot.

hero.name: McCree
hero.description: Armed with his Peacekeeper revolver, McCree takes out targets with deadeye precision and dives out of danger with eagle-like speed.

data.name: Endothermic Blaster
data.description: Mei's blaster unleashes a concentrated, short-range stream of frost that damages, slows, and ultimately freezes enemies in place. Mei can also use her blaster to shoot icicle-like projectiles at medium range.

hero.name: Mei
hero.description: Mei’s weather-altering devices slow opponents and protect locations. Her Endothermic Blaster unleashes damaging icicles and frost streams, and she can Cryo-Freeze herself to guard against counterattacks, or obstruct the opposing team's movements with an Ice Wall.

data.name: Cryo-Freeze
data.description: Mei instantly surrounds herself with a block of thick ice. She heals and ignores damage while encased, but cannot move or use abilities.

hero.name: Mei
hero.description: Mei’s weather-altering devices slow opponents and protect locations. Her Endothermic Blaster unleashes damaging icicles and frost streams, and she can Cryo-Freeze herself to guard against counterattacks, or obstruct the opposing team's movements with an Ice Wall.

data.name: Ice Wall
data.description: Mei generates an enormous ice wall that obstructs lines of sight, stops movement, and blocks attacks.

hero.name: Mei
hero.description: Mei’s weather-altering devices slow opponents and protect locations. Her Endothermic Blaster unleashes damaging icicles and frost streams, and she can Cryo-Freeze herself to guard against counterattacks, or obstruct the opposing team's movements with an Ice Wall.

data.name: Blizzard
data.description: Mei deploys a weather-modification drone that emits gusts of wind and snow in a wide area. Enemies caught in the blizzard are slowed and take damage; those who linger too long are frozen solid.

hero.name: Mei
hero.description: Mei’s weather-altering devices slow opponents and protect locations. Her Endothermic Blaster unleashes damaging icicles and frost streams, and she can Cryo-Freeze herself to guard against counterattacks, or obstruct the opposing team's movements with an Ice Wall.

data.name: Caduceus Staff
data.description: Mercy engages one of two beams that connect to an ally. By maintaining the beams, she can either restore that ally's health or increase the amount of damage they deal.

hero.name: Mercy
hero.description: Mercy’s Valkyrie Suit helps keep her close to teammates like a guardian angel; healing, resurrecting or strengthening them with the beams emanating from her Caduceus Staff.

data.name: Caduceus Blaster
data.description: Mercy shoots a round from her sidearm. It's best reserved for emergency personal defense.

hero.name: Mercy
hero.description: Mercy’s Valkyrie Suit helps keep her close to teammates like a guardian angel; healing, resurrecting or strengthening them with the beams emanating from her Caduceus Staff.

data.name: Guardian Angel
data.description: Mercy flies towards a targeted ally, allowing her to reach them quickly and provide assistance in crucial moments.

hero.name: Mercy
hero.description: Mercy’s Valkyrie Suit helps keep her close to teammates like a guardian angel; healing, resurrecting or strengthening them with the beams emanating from her Caduceus Staff.

data.name: Angelic Descent
data.description: Propelled by her Valkyrie suit, Mercy slows the speed of her descent from great heights.

hero.name: Mercy
hero.description: Mercy’s Valkyrie Suit helps keep her close to teammates like a guardian angel; healing, resurrecting or strengthening them with the beams emanating from her Caduceus Staff.

data.name: Resurrect
data.description: Mercy radiates restorative power, bringing nearby dead allies back into the fight with full health.

hero.name: Mercy
hero.description: Mercy’s Valkyrie Suit helps keep her close to teammates like a guardian angel; healing, resurrecting or strengthening them with the beams emanating from her Caduceus Staff.

data.name: Rocket Launcher
data.description: Pharah’s primary weapon launches rockets that deal significant damage in a wide blast radius.

hero.name: Pharah
hero.description: Soaring through the air in her combat armor, and armed with a launcher that lays down high-explosive rockets, Pharah is a force to be reckoned with.
